text: Ezɨ Livaibar gumazir dapanir faragha zuir kaba, Konania uan dozimning Semaia ko, Netanel ko, Livain igharazir kaba: Hasabia ko, Jeiel Josabat, me sipsipɨn nguzir avɨriba ko, memen nguzir bar avɨriba ini, dar dɨbobonim 5,000ɨn tu. Egha 500 bulmakaun apuriba sara ini, ezɨ asɨzir kaba bar, me da isa Livaibagh anɨngi. Eghtɨ me God, Israelia Gitazir Dughiam Gɨnɨghnɨghamin Isam bagh, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ofa damuam.
